Feminist Book Club
About Calendar

Week 4: Women & The Workplace: Part 1

Mar 23, 2015

Discussion Topics

  • What do you see as being your biggest hurtle as a woman at work?
  • Do you think women hold themselves back at work?
  • Have you even been “mansplained” to?

This week’s must reads:

  • “Men Explain Things to Me” essay from Men Explain Things to Me by Rebecca Solnit
  • Lean In by Sheryl Sandberg

Additional content to read/watch:

  • Watch Sheryl Sanbderg’s TED Talk “Why We Have Too Few Women Leaders”
  • “Speaking While Female” Sheryl Sandberg and Adam Grand on Why Women Stay Quiet at Work from their “Women At Work” column in the New York Times
  • Read “Rethink What You ‘Know’ About High-Achieving Women” by Robin J. Ely, Pamela Stone, and Colleen Ammerman from the Harvard Business Review
  • Read “Mansplaning Mansplaing: A Man Explains Mansplaning” by Michael Mayberry from McSweeneys
  • Feminist Book Club

This is an eight (8) week book club/discussion group. Girl power!
